contribution.generic:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for a generic contribution if no specific track is associated.
**UI Location**: Journey page → Contribution list item → Extra info section
**When Users See This**: When a user's contribution does not belong to a specific track.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Generic"
contributingSection.youHaventContributed:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the section when a user has no contributions.
**UI Location**: Journey page → Contributing section
**When Users See This**: When a user's total reputation is zero, indicating no contributions.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "You haven't contributed to Exercism yet"
contributingSection.seeHowYouCanContribu:
**Functional Purpose**: Call to action to encourage users to contribute.
**UI Location**: Journey page → Contributing section (when empty)
**When Users See This**: When a user has no contributions.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "See how you can contribute"
contributingSection.yourContributions:
**Functional Purpose**: Section heading for the user's contributions.
**UI Location**: Journey page → Contributing section
**When Users See This**: When a user has made contributions.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Your contributions"
